DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether food ingredient ( ) affect glycemic insulinemic response .
DOC.criteria: Subject 1875 year age Subject male nonpregnant female , 1875 year age , inclusive Subject body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20.0 < 35 kg/m² screening ( visit 1 ) . Subject nonsmoker . Subject willing maintain habitual diet , physical activity pattern , body weight throughout trial . Subject willing maintain current dietary supplement use throughout trial . On test day , subject agrees take dietary supplement dismissal GI lab . Failure comply result reschedule test visit . Subject normal fasting serum glucose ( < 7.0mmol/L capillary correspond whole blood glucose < 6.3mmol/L ) . Subject willing abstain alcohol consumption avoid vigorous physical activity 24 h prior test visit . Subject health condition would prevent fulfilling study requirement judge Investigator basis medical history . Subject understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator .
